name: Magnetic Miner Men - Galway GameJam8
description:
A distant and bleak future – the year 2016…
Planet Earth's oil has dried. In a desperate search, two brave souls take off into the starry abyss. They are…
The Magnetic Miner Men!

But misfortune has stricken the Magnetic Miner Men, and they find themselves lost in the depths of a distant planet.
Using the power of MAGNETS, their ships can fly infinitely – as long as they stay close enough together.

If the miner's ships come too close together, they might crash and explode.
If they push one another too far away, they might crash and explode.
(Magnetic attraction and resistance is important to understand).

Avoid falling rocks and the mine's creepy creatures. Gather oil and survive to get a high score!

USE Mouse 1 to flip Left Ship.

USE Mouse 2 to flip Right Ship.

Programming by Alan Stewart. Twitter: @ajsgamedev
Art and Sound by Eoin Finnegan. Twitter: @FiascoFinn
